import React, {useState} from 'react' import AuthContext from '../../context/Auth/authContext' const Login = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState ({ email: '', password: '' }) const {email, password} = user const onChange = e => setUser({...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) const onSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() console.log('Login Submited') } return (

Account Login

) } export default Login
